description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts on any surface within their range of vision.

abilities.description: Robin demonstrates using her Hana Hana powers to sprout multiple arms from quicksand to pull Luffy to safety.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Seastone

description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand at will.

abilities.description: Crocodile creates a massive quicksand pit by stabbing the ground, causing the area to collapse and bury victims alive.

weaknesses.weakness: Water negates the sand powers and makes Crocodile's body solid

name.japanese: トリトリの実 モデル：ファルコン
name.romanized: Tori Tori no Mi, Moderu: Farukon

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a falcon or falcon-human hybrid, granting flight and enhanced combat abilities.

abilities.description: Pell can transform into a falcon to fly at high speeds across long distances.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Seastone
